verses.roman:
svarūpa kahe,--'uṭha, prabhu, cala nija-ghare
tathāi tomāre saba karimu gocare'

synonyms: svarūpa kahe—Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī replied; uṭha prabhu—my dear Lord, please get up; cala—go; nija-ghare—to Your place; tathāi—there; tomāre—unto You; saba—all; karimu gocare—I shall inform.
translation: Svarūpa Dāmodara said, "My dear Lord, please get up. Let us go to Your place. There I shall tell You everything that has happened."
